availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Owsley County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Lucy Snowden. Father of Margaret Snowden. Farmer in Owsley County in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owsley County, p. 24. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owsley County, Proctor, p. 93. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lee County, Beatyville, Thomas Precinct, p. 2.
